name: Midnight Frenzy
description:
In this game you play as a ninja wolf who went to the wrong graveyard. Now you must dodge and dash through a ton of ghosts, but they aren't your typical ghosts. They have ghostly shotguns. You can't exactly slice a ghost, but they're own weapons probably could. 

Try your hardest to survive as long as possible and get the highest score known to man! or try to beat mine (823)
